product_name: BriarTek Inc Cerberus CerberLink Satellite Messenger for Apple iOS and Android
long_description: BriarTek Inc Cerberus CerberLink satellite messenger isn't a distress radio beacon. It's not a personal locator beacon. It's the ability to stay connected and communicate where other devices can't!
short_description: BriarTek Inc Cerberus CerberLink satellite messenger isn't a distress radio beacon. It's not a personal locator beacon. It's the ability to stay connected and communicate where other devices can't!
